name: film_gls
author: FMRIB Analysis Group, University of Oxford
description: General Linear Model fitting with autocorrelation in FMRI

inputs.description: Input data file (NIFTI for volumetric, GIFTI for surface)
inputs.name: Input file

inputs.description: Perform autocorrelation estimation only
inputs.name: Autocorrelation estimation only

inputs.description: Initial threshold to apply to input data
inputs.name: Initial threshold

inputs.description: Fits autoregressive model - default is to use tukey with M=sqrt(numvols)
inputs.name: Autoregressive model flag

inputs.description: Do not estimate autocorrelations
inputs.name: No autocorrelation estimation flag

inputs.description: Output prewhitened data and average design matrix
inputs.name: Output PW data

inputs.description: Estimates autocorrelation using PAVA - default is to use tukey with M=sqrt(numvols)
inputs.name: PAVA autocorrelation estimation

inputs.description: Smooths autocorrelation estimates
inputs.name: Smooth autocorrelation estimates flag

inputs.description: Outputs full data
inputs.name: Verbose flag

inputs.description: Directory name to store results in, default is results
inputs.name: Results directory

inputs.description: Analysis mode, options are volumetric (default) or surface. Caution: surface-based functionality is still BETA
inputs.name: Analysis mode

inputs.description: Input surface for autocorrelation smoothing in surface-based analyses
inputs.name: Input surface file

inputs.description: Re-estimate mean_func baseline - for use with perfusion subtraction
inputs.name: Mean function file

inputs.description: Minimum timepoint file
inputs.name: Minimum timepoint file

inputs.description: Paradigm file
inputs.name: Paradigm file

inputs.description: T-contrasts file
inputs.name: T-contrasts file

inputs.description: F-contrasts file
inputs.name: F-contrasts file

inputs.description: SUSAN brightness threshold for volumetric analysis/smoothing sigma for surface analysis
inputs.name: SUSAN brightness threshold

inputs.description: SUSAN mask size for volumetric analysis/smoothing extent for surface analysis
inputs.name: SUSAN mask size

inputs.description: Uses tukey window to estimate autocorrelation with window size num - default is to use tukey with M=sqrt(numvols)
inputs.name: Tukey window size

inputs.description: Uses multitapering with slepian tapers and num is the time-bandwidth product - default is to use tukey with M=sqrt(numvols)
inputs.name: Multitapering time-bandwidth product

inputs.description: List of numbers indicating voxelwise EVs position in the design matrix (list order corresponds to files in vxf option). Caution BETA option, only use with volumetric analysis.
inputs.name: Voxelwise EVs positions

inputs.description: List of 4D images containing voxelwise EVs (list order corresponds to numbers in vxl option). Caution BETA option, only use with volumetric analysis.
inputs.name: Voxelwise EVs files
